name: claude-skills-presentation-you
description: Orchestrates creation of beautiful Slidev presentation decks using deterministic rules.

tools.name: init_project
tools.description: Initialize a new Slidev project with the correct structure and dependencies.

tools.name: render_deck
tools.description: Render a deterministic JSON deck specification into Slidev markdown files.

tools.name: validate_deck
tools.description: Validate DeckSpec / SlidePatch JSON against the schema.

tools.name: slidev_introspect
tools.description: Print the local Slidev project's built-in layouts, components, and config keys (from node_modules).

tools.name: apply_patch
tools.description: Apply a SlidePatch JSON to a Slidev project deterministically.

tools.name: list_slides
tools.description: List slides in a Slidev project with titles.

tools.name: read_slide
tools.description: Read a specific slide by number from a Slidev project.

tools.name: audit_project
tools.description: Audit a Slidev project for broken slide references.

tools.name: export_deck
tools.description: Export a Slidev project to PPTX/PDF/PNG deterministically.

author: Claude
